para.text: This module allow a sequence of states to be defined. This can be used for testing the trip times or other time measurements.

table.style: border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#c0c0c0; border-style:solid;

para.text: Insert a state before currently state.
Copy currently state append to last.
Combo box, provide navigates and indicates the number of currently and total states.
Exchange the currently state with previous (Up) or next (Down) state.
Number of repeat circles for all states.
Alias of the state name for identifications. Allow for freely rename.
Provide "Continuous waveform" and "Absolute Phase Setting" 2 state switching modes. The
Enable this option to disable currently state outputs in the sequence.
Analog outputs provides 11 set modes for 2 group of 3-Phase network. Depends to the hardware of voltage channels of relay test kit model, voltage channels of group 2 may be disabled automatically.

table.style: border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#c0c0c0; border-style:solid;

para.text: Symmetrical, allow set line-line voltage, V0, phase currents and angles, All the frequency value is got from Fnom of Device tab in Test Object.
Provide set for V1, V2, V0, I1, I2, I0 and angles.
Provide set real power(W), reactive power(var), phase voltages and angles.
Provide set for fault type, voltage, current and angle.
Provide set the fault type, fault impedance and angle or resistance R and reactance X, with constant current. the fault voltage calculated by module.
Provide set the fault type, fault impedance and angle or resistance R and reactance X, with constant voltage. the fault current calculated by module.
Provide set the fault type, fault impedance and angle or resistance R and reactance X, with constant SIR(ZS/ZL), the fault current and voltage calculated by module.
Provide set the fault type, fault impedance in % of line length, constant angle, with constant current. the fault voltage calculated by module.
Provide set the fault type, fault impedance in % of line length, constant angle, with constant voltage. the fault current calculated by module.
Provide set the fault type, fault impedance in % of line length, constant angle, with constant SIR(ZS/ZL), the fault current and voltage calculated by module.
